item.title: [PI] Castle Wars GFX [PI]
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

You could make the stepping zones each teleport you to another one, i suppose. And, thats not GFX, i believe your thinking of Anims.

Aswell as the portals, get the portal id’s then what your going to want to do is go into Actionhandler.java,
And type in your case number, aswell as the getPA Statements.

If you have no idea what im talking about, heres an example:

case PORTALIDHERE: c.getPA().movePlayer(COORDx, COORDy, 0); break;

Read full topic
